Taste of the Middle East

San Francisco's Most Acclaimed Lebanese Restaurant

Breakfast

Nothing beats the traditional Lebanese breakfast made up of thick, creamy labne and olive oil, cheese of all kind, olives, zaatar, cucumbers, tomatoes, fresh mint leaves, hummus and tea. Pair all that for the ultimate traditional Lebanese breakfast.

Healthy

Lebanese salad recipes are bright, refreshing, and high on flavor. Fresh vegetables find their way into dishes like tabbouleh and fattoush, making Lebanese food one of the healthiest on the planet. These salads are the perfect addition to any meal.

Grilled

Well known grilled Lebanese dishes include mainly falafel, shawarma and tawook which is a traditional Middle Eastern chicken dish. These grilled food are incredibly popular in Lebanon. Test out these recipes yourself and you're bound to love them.
